name: The Boys in the Band
summary_text: At a birthday party in 1968 New York, a surprise guest and a drunken game leave seven gay friends reckoning with unspoken feelings and buried truths.

name: Return to Sender
summary_text: A nurse living in small town goes on a blind date with a man who is not the person he says he is.

name: Leap of Faith
summary_text: Fake faith healer Jonas Nightingale is stranded in a small town where he finds he can't fool all of the people all of the time.

name: Meet John Doe
summary_text: A man needing money agrees to impersonate a non-existent person who said he'd be committing suicide as a protest, and a political movement begins.

name: Blue Chips
summary_text: A college basketball coach is forced to break the rules in order to get the players he needs to stay competitive.

name: Labyrinth of Lies
summary_text: A story that exposes the conspiracy of prominent German institutions and government branches to cover up the crimes of Nazis during World War II.

name: Certain Women
summary_text: The lives of three women intersect in small-town America, where each is imperfectly blazing a trail.

name: Brideshead Revisited
summary_text: A poignant story of forbidden love and the loss of innocence set in England prior to World War II.

name: King of Thieves
summary_text: A true crime movie about a crew of retired crooks who pull off a major heist in London's jewelry district. What starts off as their last criminal hurrah, quickly turns into a brutal nightmare due to greed.

name: Little Caesar
summary_text: A small-time criminal moves to a big city to seek bigger fortune.

name: Chappaquiddick
summary_text: Depicting Ted Kennedy's involvement in the fatal 1969 car accident that claims the life of a young campaign strategist, Mary Jo Kopechne.

name: Tyler Perry's Why Did I Get Married?
summary_text: The big screen adaptation of Perry's stage play about the trials of marriage, and what happens to one family when a sexy young temptress arrives on the scene.

name: Incir Reçeli
summary_text: On a night of despair after being turned down continuously for the scripts he writes, Metin ends up in a bar where he meets a girl named Duygu. After spending the night together, she walks ...                See full summary »

name: The Day
summary_text: A group of five people working to stay alive in a post-apocalyptic future discover what they think is a safe, abandoned farmhouse, but they soon find themselves fighting to stay alive as a gang of bloodthirsty predators attack.

name: Snow Angels
summary_text: A drama that interweaves the life of a teenager, with his old baby sitter, her estranged husband, and their daughter.

name: Code Unknown
summary_text: A young man harasses a homeless woman, another man protests, the police arrest both and the woman has to leave the country. What were their various story-lines leading up to this event?

name: Bliss
summary_text: A mind-bending love story following Greg who, after recently being divorced and then fired, meets the mysterious Isabel, a woman living on the streets and convinced that the polluted, broken world around them is a computer simulation.

name: Henry Poole Is Here
summary_text: Henry Poole moves in to a house in his old neighborhood, to spend what he believes are his remaining days alone. The discovery of a "miracle" by a nosy neighbor ruptures his solitude and restores his faith in life.

name: Terrified
summary_text: When strange events occur in a neighborhood in Buenos Aires, a doctor specializing in the paranormal, her colleague, and an ex police officer decide to investigate further.

name: Fresh
summary_text: Death and violence anger a twelve-year-old drug courier, who sets his employers against each other.

name: Murder, My Sweet
summary_text: After being hired to find an ex-con's former girlfriend, Philip Marlowe is drawn into a deeply complex web of mystery and deceit.

name: The Last Days of Disco
summary_text: Story of two female Manhattan book editors fresh out of college, both finding love and themselves while frequenting the local disco.

name: The Vault
summary_text: Two estranged sisters are forced to rob a bank in order to save their brother. But this is no ordinary bank.

name: Wildling
summary_text: A blossoming teenager uncovers the dark secret behind her traumatic childhood.

name: Kicking and Screaming
summary_text: A bunch of guys hang around their college for months after graduation, continuing a life much like the one before graduation.

name: Snow Cake
summary_text: A drama focused on the friendship between a high-functioning autistic woman and a man who is traumatized after a fatal car accident.

name: Blackadder's Christmas Carol
summary_text: After a genial spirit shows the benevolent Ebenezer Blackadder visions of his unscrupulous ancestors, he resolves to mend his generous ways.

name: Breaker Morant
summary_text: Three Australian lieutenants are court martialed for executing prisoners as a way of deflecting attention from war crimes committed by their superior officers.

name: The Map of Tiny Perfect Things
summary_text: Two teens who live the same day repeatedly, enabling them to create the titular map.

name: Hoodwinked Too! Hood vs. Evil
summary_text: Red Riding Hood is training in the group of Sister Hoods, when she and the Wolf are called to examine the sudden mysterious disappearance of Hansel and Gretel.

name: A Dirty Shame
summary_text: An uptight, middle-aged, repressed woman turns into a sex addict after getting hit on the head, and she then falls into an underground subculture of sex addicts in suburban Baltimore.

name: Xanadu
summary_text: A struggling artist living in Los Angeles meets a girl who may hold the key to his happiness.

name: Slaughterhouse-Five
summary_text: Billy Pilgrim has mysteriously become unstuck in time. He goes on an uncontrollable trip back and forth from his birth in New York to life on a distant planet and back again to the horrors of the 1945 fire-bombing of Dresden.

name: A Special Day
summary_text: Two neighbors, a persecuted journalist and a resigned housewife, meet during Hitler's visit to Italy in May 1938.

name: Neon Genesis Evangelion: Death & Rebirth
summary_text: A recap of the first 24 episodes of Neon Genesis Evangelion, followed by a 30-minute continuation of the plot that would later form the first third of The End of Evangelion.

name: Operatsiya 'Y' i drugie priklyucheniya Shurika
summary_text: Three stories about Shurik - a young student. He fights against criminals, falls in love, confuses apartments, passes exams - he lives after all.

name: Kilo Two Bravo
summary_text: Kajaki Dam 2006. A company of young British soldiers encounter an unexpected, terrifying enemy. A dried-out river bed, and under every step the possibility of an anti-personnel mine. A mine that could cost you your leg - or your life.

name: D.A.R.Y.L.
summary_text: A seemingly normal young boy turns out to be a top secret, military-created robot with superhuman abilities.

name: Winter in Wartime
summary_text: In the Nazi-occupied Netherlands, a teenage boy gets involved in the Dutch Resistance after coming to the aid of a wounded RAF pilot.

name: Athadu
summary_text: A gunman for hire is framed for murder, and assumes a dead man's identity while hiding from the police.

name: Hallam Foe
summary_text: Hallam's talent for spying on people reveals his darkest fears-and his most peculiar desires. Driven to expose the true cause of his mother's death, he instead finds himself searching the rooftops of the city for love.

name: Twelve O'Clock High
summary_text: A hard-as-nails general takes over a bomber unit suffering from low morale and whips them into fighting shape.

name: House of Usher
summary_text: Upon entering his fiancée's family mansion, a man discovers a savage family curse and fears that his future brother-in-law has entombed his bride-to-be prematurely.

name: Daydream Nation
summary_text: A city girl who moves to a small town and becomes entangled in a love triangle between her high school teacher and a stoner classmate.

name: Curse of the Demon
summary_text: American professor John Holden arrives in London for a parapsychology conference, only to find himself investigating the mysterious actions of Devil-worshiper Julian Karswell.

name: Jezebel
summary_text: In 1850s Louisiana, a free-spirited Southern belle loses her fiancé due to her stubborn vanity and pride, and vows to win him back.

name: Ride the High Country
summary_text: An ex-union soldier is hired to transport gold from a mining community through dangerous territory. But what he doesn't realize is that his partner and old friend is plotting to double-cross him.

name: Five Minutes of Heaven
summary_text: The story of former UVF member Alistair Little. Twenty-five years after Little killed Joe Griffen's brother, the media arrange an auspicious meeting between the two.

name: N.H 10
summary_text: On their way to a weekend retreat, a married couple find their dream vacation turn into a nightmare when they cross paths with a dangerous gang.

name: Fair Game
summary_text: Max Kirkpatrick is a cop who protects Kate McQuean, a civil law attorney, from a renegade KGB team out to terminate her.

name: Family Business
summary_text: An ex professor offers Adam $1,000,000 to "get" some plasma from a high tech company's lab. Adam asks his criminal grandpa for help. Can they convince Adam's now honest dad to join?

name: La Grande Bouffe
summary_text: A group of men go to a villa in the French countryside where they resolve to eat themselves to death.

name: Churchill
summary_text: Ninety-six hours before the World War II invasion of Normandy, British Prime Minister Winston Churchill struggles with his severe reservations with Operation Overlord and his increasingly marginalized role in the war effort.

name: Trailer Park Boys: The Movie
summary_text: Ricky, Julian and Bubbles come up with a scheme to steal large amounts of untraceable coins.

name: Killing Gunther
summary_text: A group of eccentric assassins are fed up with Gunther, the world's greatest hitman, and decide to kill him, but their plan turns into a series of bungled encounters as Gunther seems to always be one step ahead.

name: Rurouni Kenshin Part II: Kyoto Inferno
summary_text: Kenshin Himura goes up against pure evil Makoto Shishio who is attempting to overthrow the Meiji government. The fate of the country hangs in the balance as Kenshin Himura takes up the sword that he vowed to never draw again.

name: Shinobi: Heart Under Blade
summary_text: Star-crossed lovers must fight on opposing sides in a battle that will determine the next Shogun.

name: In Darkness
summary_text: A blind musician hears a murder committed in the apartment upstairs from hers that sends her down a dark path into London's gritty criminal underworld.

name: Home for the Holidays
summary_text: After losing her job, making out with her soon-to-be former boss, and finding out that her daughter plans to spend Thanksgiving with her boyfriend, Claudia Larson faces spending the holiday with her family.

name: 3 from Hell
summary_text: After barely surviving prison, the demented Firefly clan go on the run, unleashing a whole new wave of murder, madness and mayhem.

name: Howl
summary_text: When passengers on a train are attacked by a creature, they must band together in order to survive until morning.

name: Demon Slayer: Mugen Train
summary_text: After his family was brutally murdered and his sister turned into a demon, Tanjiro Kamado's journey as a demon slayer began. Tanjiro and his comrades embark on a new mission aboard the Mugen Train, on track to despair.

name: Veronika Decides to Die
summary_text: After a frantic suicide attempt, Veronika awakens inside a mysterious mental asylum. Under the supervision of an unorthodox psychiatrist who specializes in controversial treatment, Veronika learns that she has only weeks to live.

name: Welcome to Mooseport
summary_text: A US president who has retired after two terms in office returns to his hometown of Mooseport, Maine and decides to run for Mayor against another local candidate.

name: Outlaw
summary_text: A group of people who feel betrayed by their government and let down by their Police force form a modern-day outlaw posse in order to right what they see as the wrongs of society.

name: Les aventures de Rabbi Jacob
summary_text: A bigoted Frenchman finds himself forced to impersonate a popular rabbi while on the run from a group of assassins - and the police.

name: Love Exposure
summary_text: A bizarre love triangle forms between a young Catholic upskirt photographer, a misandric girl and a manipulative cultist.

name: Çalgi Çengi
summary_text: Two musicians witness a murder, which gets them entangled with a bunch of street thugs and mafia.

name: Night and the City
summary_text: A small-time grifter and nightclub tout takes advantage of some fortuitous circumstances and tries to become a big-time player as a wrestling promoter.

name: Cyberbully
summary_text: A teenager is subjected to a campaign of bullying by classmates through a social networking site.

name: W.E.
summary_text: The affair between King Edward VIII and American divorcée Wallis Simpson, and a contemporary romance between a married woman and a Russian security guard.

name: Shade
summary_text: A group of hustlers encounter "The Dean" and pull off a successful sting that results in their pursuit by a vengeful gangster.

name: The 7th Voyage of Sinbad
summary_text: When a princess is shrunken by an evil wizard, Sinbad must undertake a quest to an island of monsters to cure her and prevent a war.

name: Love Is Strange
summary_text: After Ben and George get married, George is fired from his teaching post, forcing them to stay with friends separately while they sell their place and look for cheaper housing -- a situation that weighs heavily on all involved.

name: Seksmisja
summary_text: Two scientists are placed in hibernation and should be awaken after three years. But when they wake up, it turns out that it has been fifty years, and they are the only two males in a new, underground society composed exclusively of women.

name: Skin
summary_text: A destitute young man, raised by racist skinheads and notorious among white supremacists, turns his back on hatred and violence to transform his life, with the help of a black activist and the woman he loves.

name: Dreamer
summary_text: Cale Crane catalyzes the rescue and rehabilitation of Sonador, a race horse with a broken leg.

name: Little Italy
summary_text: A young couple must navigate a blossoming romance, amidst a war between their families' competing pizza restaurants.

name: Wheels on Meals
summary_text: Two Chinese friends, who operate a food truck in Barcelona, Spain, use their martial arts expertise to help their private investigator friend protect the pickpocket Sylvia, who's been targeted by a ruthless gang.

name: Avengement
summary_text: After years of assaults on him in prison, convicted felon Cain Burgess escapes for avengement on those responsible.

name: Mark Felt: The Man Who Brought Down the White House
summary_text: The story of Mark Felt, who under the name "Deep Throat" helped journalists Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the Watergate scandal in 1972.

name: Copenhagen
summary_text: When the girl of your dreams is half your age, it's time to grow up.

name: Violet & Daisy
summary_text: Two teenage assassins accept what they think will be a quick-and-easy job, until an unexpected target throws them off their plan.

name: Wild Bill
summary_text: A street-toughened parolee finds his two boys abandoned by their mum and fending for themselves. Time to step up, or not.

name: Wildcats
summary_text: A rookie high school football coach has a harder time than she expected trying to whip her tough inner city team into shape.

name: Tarzan
summary_text: Tarzan and Jane Porter face a mercenary army dispatched by the evil CEO of Greystoke Energies, a man who took over the company from Tarzan's parents, after they died in a plane crash.

name: The Escort
summary_text: Desperate for a good story, a sex-addicted journalist throws himself into the world of high-class escorts when he starts following a Stanford-educated prostitute.

name: Shimmer Lake
summary_text: An inventive crime thriller told backwards -- reversing day by day through a week -- following a local sheriff's quest to unlock the mystery of three small town criminals and a bank heist gone wrong.

name: The Ghazi Attack
summary_text: A Pakistani submarine, Ghazi plans to secretly attack Vizag port. For doing so, it has to get past Indian submarine S21.

name: Radioactive
summary_text: The incredible true story of Marie Sklodowska-Curie and her Nobel Prize-winning work that changed the world.

name: The Green Berets
summary_text: Col. Mike Kirby picks two teams of crack Green Berets for a mission in South Vietnam. First off is to build and control a camp that is trying to be taken by the enemy the second mission is to kidnap a North Vietnamese General.

name: Last Love
summary_text: He's a widower in Paris who speaks no French. She's a dance instructor less than half his age. Can they become a family, or will his estranged adult children halt the friendship?

name: I Spit on Your Grave: Vengeance is Mine
summary_text: Jennifer is still haunted by the memory of being gang raped and almost killed years ago. At her therapist's advice, she joins group therapy and meets similar women. She befriends one and they want more than just talk - justice/vengeance.

name: Black or White
summary_text: A grieving widower is drawn into a custody battle over his granddaughter, whom he helped raise her entire life.

name: The Duke of Burgundy
summary_text: A woman who studies butterflies and moths tests the limits of her relationship with her lesbian lover.

name: PCU
summary_text: A high school senior visits college for the weekend, and stays at the wildest house on campus.

name: Lost Horizon
summary_text: When a wise diplomat's plane crashes in the snows of Tibet, he and the other survivors are guided to Shangri-La, where they wrestle with the invitation to stay.

name: Takva
summary_text: A promotion brings a Muslim's relationship with God into question.

name: The Dark Valley
summary_text: Through a hidden path a lone rider reaches a little town high up in the Alps. Nobody knows where the stranger comes from, nor what he wants there. But everyone knows that they don't want him to stay.

name: Amelia
summary_text: A look at the life of legendary American pilot Amelia Earhart, who disappeared while flying over the Pacific Ocean in 1937 in an attempt to make a flight around the world.

name: Absence of Malice
summary_text: When a prosecutor leaks a false story that a liquor warehouse owner is involved in the murder of a union head, the man's life begins to unravel.

name: Slums of Beverly Hills
summary_text: In 1976, a lower-middle-class teenager struggles to cope living with her neurotic family of nomads on the outskirts of Beverly Hills.

name: Night Moves
summary_text: Los Angeles private investigator Harry Moseby is hired by a client to find her runaway teenage daughter. Moseby tracks the daughter down, only to stumble upon something much more intriguing and sinister.

name: Old Yeller
summary_text: A teenage boy grows to love a stray yellow dog while helping his mother and younger brother run their Texas homestead while their father is away on a cattle drive. First thought to be good-for-nothing mutt, Old Yeller is soon beloved by all.

name: Truman
summary_text: Julián receives an unexpected visit from his friend Tomás, who lives in Canada. The two men, accompanied by Julián's faithful dog, Truman, will share emotional and surprising moments prompted by Julián's complicated situation.

name: The Legend of Hell House
summary_text: A physicist, his wife and two mediums are hired to investigate the Belasco House, where 27 guests had inexplicably died in 1927, along with most of a team of paranormal investigators that was sent in the early 1950s.

name: Bon Cop Bad Cop
summary_text: Two Canadian detectives, one from Ontario and the other from Quebec, must work together when a murdered victim is found on the Ontario-Quebec border.

name: Astérix et Cléopâtre
summary_text: Provoked, Cleopatra bets Caesar, that she can build a big palace in 3 months. An architect is given 3 months or else.. Fortunately, Getafix/Panoramix, Asterix and Obelix come to Alexandria to help.

name: Conversations with Other Women
summary_text: When a man and woman flirt with each other at a wedding reception, the sexual tension seems spontaneous. As they break from the party to a hotel room, the flirtation turns into a night filled with passion and remorse.

name: The English Teacher
summary_text: An English teacher's life is disrupted when a former student returns to her small town after failing as a playwright in New York.

name: The War
summary_text: An emotionally fractured Vietnam vet returns to his family in rural Mississippi, counseling his kids when they have to fight their own neighborhood battle. From the director of Fried Green Tomatoes.

name: On the Beach
summary_text: After a global nuclear war, the residents of Australia must come to terms with the fact that all life will be destroyed in a matter of months.

name: College
summary_text: A wild weekend is in store for three high school seniors who visit a local college campus as prospective freshmen.

name: Ustad Hotel
summary_text: Faisi wants to go to UK to become a professional chef but circumstances force him to assist his grandfather in a small restaurant in Kozhikode city, changing his outlook on life forever.

name: 100 Feet
summary_text: After Marnie Watson kills her abusive husband in self-defense, she is condemned to house arrest... only to discover that the house is possessed by the enraged and violent spirit of her dead husband.

name: The Thief of Bagdad
summary_text: After being tricked and cast out of Bagdad by the evil Jaffar, King Ahmad joins forces with a thief named Abu to reclaim his throne, the city, and the Princess he loves.

name: La Belle Époque
summary_text: A couple in crisis. He, disillusioned, sees his life upset the day an entrepreneur offers him to plunge back into the time of his choice.

name: Coffee & Kareem
summary_text: Twelve-year-old Kareem Manning hires a criminal to scare his mom's new boyfriend -police officer James Coffee - but it backfires, forcing Coffee and Kareem to team up in order to save themselves from Detroit's most ruthless drug kingpin.

name: The Picture of Dorian Gray
summary_text: A corrupt young man somehow keeps his youthful beauty, but a special painting gradually reveals his inner ugliness to all.

name: Louder Than Bombs
summary_text: The fractious family of a father and his two sons confront their different feelings and memories of their deceased wife and mother, a famed war photographer.

name: Palindromes
summary_text: Aviva is thirteen, awkward and sensitive. Her mother Joyce is warm and loving, as is her father, Steve, a regular guy who does have a fierce temper from time to time. The film revolves around her family, friends and neighbors.

name: The Forger
summary_text: A thief works with his father and son to forge a painting by Monet and steal the original. Together, they plan the heist of their lives.

name: Adulthood
summary_text: Six years after KiDULTHOOD, Sam Peel is released from jail for killing Trife, he realizes that life is no easier on the outside than it was on the inside and he's forced to confront the ...                See full summary »

name: Vavien
summary_text: A reckless electrician, who is struggling with debt, decides to kill his wife and use her savings as a way out. His plan takes an unexpected twist when his loving wife, comes back from the dead to be with her family.

name: Dragon Hunters
summary_text: A fantastic tale telling the adventures of two dragon hunters!

name: The Diary of Anne Frank
summary_text: During World War II, a teenage Jewish girl named Anne Frank and her family are forced into hiding in the Nazi-occupied Netherlands.

name: The Secret Life of Words
summary_text: A hearing impaired factory worker gives up her first holiday in years and instead travels out to an oil rig, where she cares for a man suffering from severe burns.

name: Incarnate
summary_text: A scientist with the ability to enter the subconscious minds of the possessed must save a young boy from the grips of a demon with powers never seen before, while facing the horrors of his past.

name: 2001 Maniacs
summary_text: Eight college students travelling to Florida for Spring Break stumble into a remote town in Georgia, where they are set upon by the residents.

name: Diva
summary_text: Two tapes, two Parisian mob killers, one corrupt policeman, an opera fan, a teenage thief, and the coolest philosopher ever filmed all twist their way through an intricate and stylish French-language thriller.

name: Crying Freeman
summary_text: A woman sees an assassin outside San Francisco killing yakuza men and later in Vancouver. She's been told that he leaves no witness. Will she be his next victim or...?

name: Escape Plan: The Extractors
summary_text: After security expert Ray Breslin is hired to rescue the kidnapped daughter of a Hong Kong tech mogul from a formidable Latvian prison, Breslin's girlfriend is also captured.

name: The Wretched
summary_text: A defiant teenage boy, struggling with his parents' imminent divorce, faces off with a thousand year-old witch, who is living beneath the skin of and posing as the woman next door.

name: Shadow Dancer
summary_text: Set in 1990s Belfast, an active member of the IRA becomes an informant for MI5 in order to protect her son's welfare.

name: Loving Annabelle
summary_text: The intelligent Annabelle starts in an elite Catholic girls' boarding high school after being expelled from the previous 2 schools. She's open about being lesbian. She's attracted to her teacher, Simone.

name: Sharknado 3: Oh Hell No!
summary_text: A monstrous tornado unleashes ravenous sharks from Washington, D.C., all the way down to Orlando, Florida.
After the death of his wife and child, an author travels to Barcelona to see his estranged brother and dying father, where he learns that his life is plagued by events that occur on 11/11/11.

name: Being Julia
summary_text: Set in 1930s London, this movie involves stage actors and actresses and their experiences with love and revenge.

name: Blood: The Last Vampire
summary_text: Saya is a Japanese vampire slayer whose next mission is in a high school on a US military base in 1960s Japan, where she poses as a student. She uses a katana/samurai sword to kill vampires.

name: Boys on the Side
summary_text: Robin shares a ride in her car with Jane from New York to Los Angeles. They stop at Jane's friend Holly's place in Pittsburgh and take her with them west, making a long stop in Tucson. The three very different women become close friends.

name: Mission Mangal
summary_text: Based on true events of the Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) successfully launching the Mars Orbiter Mission (Mangalyaan), making it the least expensive mission to Mars.

name: Flashbacks of a Fool
summary_text: A fading Hollywood star looks back at the days of his youth as he returns home from his best friend's funeral.

name: Redline
summary_text: A story about the most popular racing event in the galaxy, the Redline, and the various racers who compete in it.

name: Cheech and Chong's Next Movie
summary_text: Cheech and Chong live in a decrepit old house and drive their neighbour crazy with their loud music, weed smoking and general anarchy and slacker view on life. Then Chong meets Cheech's Texan cousin Red and things kick up a notch.

name: Time
summary_text: To save her relationship, a woman puts herself through extensive plastic surgery.

name: Aparajito
summary_text: Following his father's death, a boy leaves home to study in Calcutta, while his mother must face a life alone.

name: Gun Crazy
summary_text: Two disturbed young people release their fascination with guns through a crime spree.

name: Tales of Halloween
summary_text: Ten stories are woven together by their shared theme of Halloween night in an American suburb, where ghouls, imps, aliens and axe murderers appear for one night only to terrorize unsuspecting residents.

name: Joshua
summary_text: The arrival of a newborn girl causes the gradual disintegration of the Cairn family; particularly for 9-year-old Joshua (Kogan), an eccentric boy whose proper upbringing and refined tastes both take a sinister turn.

name: Reign of the Supermen
summary_text: After the death of Superman, several new people present themselves as possible successors.

name: Manhattan Night
summary_text: A reporter becomes involved with a mysterious woman while investigating her late husband's death.

name: The Slumberparty Massacre
summary_text: A female high school student's slumber party turns into a bloodbath, as a newly escaped psychotic serial killer wielding a power drill prowls her neighborhood.

name: Music of the Heart
summary_text: Story of a schoolteacher's struggle to teach violin to inner-city Harlem kids.

name: Silenced
summary_text: Based on real events, this film depicts the story of a school for the hearing-impaired where young deaf students were sexually assaulted by the faculty members over a long period of time.

name: Bala
summary_text: It tells the story of a man who is balding prematurely and how he copes up with the situation.

name: Ten Inch Hero
summary_text: An artist gets a job at a beachside sandwich shop, where she hangs out with a techie, a flirt, a rocker, a hippie, and a Wiccan.

name: Dunston Checks In
summary_text: A young boy befriends a larcenous orangutan in a luxury hotel.

name: The Cottage
summary_text: A tough, cute woman is kidnapped for ransom and brought to a rural English cottage. David and two morons have way more to worry about than her crime boss stepdad, his two Asian killers and her.

name: The Letter
summary_text: The wife of a rubber plantation administrator shoots a man to death and claims it was self-defense, but a letter in her own hand may prove her undoing.

name: Human Capital
summary_text: The destinies of two families are irrevocably tied together after a cyclist is hit off the road by a jeep in the night before Christmas Eve.

name: Cul-de-sac
summary_text: In search of help, two wounded gangsters on the run find refuge in the secluded castle of a feeble man and his wife; however, under the point of a gun, nothing is what it seems.

name: Intruders
summary_text: Anna suffers from agoraphobia so crippling that when a trio of criminals break into her house, she cannot bring herself to flee. But what the intruders don't realize is that agoraphobia is not her only problem.

name: Runaway
summary_text: In the near future, a police officer specializes in malfunctioning robots. When a robot turns out to have been programmed to kill, he begins to uncover a homicidal plot to create killer robots... and his son becomes a target.

name: Roja
summary_text: A woman from a village in Tamil Nadu marries a sophisticated city dweller and moves with him to Kashmir, where all is rosy - until he gets kidnapped by militants.

name: The Sheltering Sky
summary_text: An American couple travel abroad to revitalize their relationship. But as the trip drags on, their attempt at recovering what they once had seems futile.

name: Horse Feathers
summary_text: Quincy Adams Wagstaff, the new president of Huxley University, accidentally hires bumblers Baravelli and Pinky to help his school win the big football game against the rival Darwin University.

name: Zashchitniki
summary_text: During the Cold War, an organization called "Patriot" created a super-hero squad, which includes members of multiple Soviet republics. For years, the heroes had to hide their identities, but in hard times they must show themselves again.

name: The Patriot
summary_text: A respected doctor must race against time to find a cure for a lethal virus, unleashed by a paramilitary militia leader.

name: The Black Stallion
summary_text: A boy encounters a horse and bonds with him, later training him to race.

name: The Last: Naruto the Movie
summary_text: Hinata Hyuga's younger sister has been kidnapped, so Naruto must do what he can to save her.

name: Hanging Up
summary_text: A trio of sisters bond over their ambivalence toward the approaching death of their curmudgeonly father, to whom none of them was particularly close.

name: Fack ju Göhte 2
summary_text: Mr. Müller and his class are taking a school trip to Thailand to strengthen the reputation of their school.

name: Robinson Crusoe
summary_text: 1703: Robinson Crusoe has to leave Scotland for a year, but after months sailing, a storm wrecks his ship. He ends up as only survivor on a desolate island.

name: Tom Jones
summary_text: The romantic and chivalrous adventures of adopted bastard Tom Jones in 18th-century England.

name: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
summary_text: After attracting both media and police attention for accidentally knocking Kate Moss into the River Thames, Edina and Patsy hide out in the south of France.

name: Vada Chennai
summary_text: A young carrom player in north Chennai becomes a reluctant participant in a war between two warring gangsters.

name: AK vs AK
summary_text: A filmmaker kidnaps the daughter of a movie star, and while the star searches for his daughter the director films the desperate search in real time for his next blockbuster movie.

name: Freaky Friday
summary_text: A mother and daughter find their personalities switched and have to live each other's lives on one strange Friday.

name: Santa Claus: The Movie
summary_text: The legend of Santa Claus is put in jeopardy when an unscrupulous toy manufacturer attempts to take over Christmas.

name: Te3n
summary_text: A grandfather, a priest, and a police officer investigate the case of a kidnapped child.

name: Nanban
summary_text: 10 years after finishing college, two best friends and their enemy go on a search for their third friend, while finding out some truths along the way.

name: The Crazies
summary_text: The military attempts to contain a manmade combat virus that causes death and permanent insanity in those infected, as it overtakes a small Pennsylvania town.

name: I Am a Fugitive from a Chain Gang
summary_text: Wrongly convicted James Allen serves in the intolerable conditions of a southern chain gang, which later comes back to haunt him.

name: Batman and Harley Quinn
summary_text: Batman and Nightwing are forced to team with the Joker's sometimes-girlfriend Harley Quinn to stop a global threat brought about by Poison Ivy and Jason Woodrue, the Floronic Man.

name: Dread
summary_text: Three college students set out to document what other people dread the most. However, one of the three turns out to secretly be a sadistic psychopath who uses this knowledge to gruesomely torture the subjects.

name: Dream Girl
summary_text: Rom-com Movie, directed by Raaj Shaandilyaa, stars Ayushmann Khurrana who plays a 'dream girl'. In every love story, there is always one trying to win the heart of the other, who could be the 'dream girl'.

name: Hatari!
summary_text: A group of men trap wild animals in Africa and sell them to zoos before the arrival of a female wildlife photographer threatens to change their ways.

name: Mine vaganti
summary_text: Tommaso is the youngest son of the Cantones, a large, traditional southern Italian family operating a pasta-making business since the 1960s. On a trip home from Rome, where he studies ...                See full summary »

name: Barda
summary_text: A group of young high society friends, aged between 18 and 25, are gathered at a friend's bar that they regularly frequent for the night. But when they finish of their last beer and prepare...                See full summary »

name: Peepli [Live]
summary_text: An impoverished farmer's threat to end his life invites attention from politicians and media.

name: Where Do We Go Now?
summary_text: A group of Lebanese women try to ease religious tensions between Christians and Muslims in their village.

name: Our Souls at Night
summary_text: Fonda and Redford star as Addie Moore and Louis Waters, a widow and widower who've lived next to each other for years. The pair have almost no relationship, but that all changes when Addie tries to make a connection with her neighbor.

name: Roma
summary_text: A fluid, unconnected and sometimes chaotic procession of scenes detailing the various people and events of life in Italy's capital, most of it based on director Federico Fellini's life.

name: A Hard Day
summary_text: After trying to cover up a car accident that left a man dead, a crooked homicide detective is stalked by a mysterious man claiming to have witnessed the event.

name: The Other Sister
summary_text: A mentally challenged young woman seeks independence by obtaining her own apartment and attending college while her family plans her sister's wedding.

name: Twelve
summary_text: A young drug dealer watches as his high-rolling life is dismantled in the wake of his cousin's murder, which sees his best friend arrested for the crime.

name: Grind
summary_text: Four skaters follow their idol on his summer tour in an attempt to get noticed, get sponsored, and become stars themselves.

name: Veere Di Wedding
summary_text: Four girls on their way to find true love discover that their friendship must remain strong till the wedding of a friend named Veer.

name: Freeheld
summary_text: New Jersey police lieutenant, Laurel Hester, and her registered domestic partner, Stacie Andree, both battle to secure Hester's pension benefits when she is diagnosed with terminal cancer.

name: The Front Runner
summary_text: In 1987, U.S. Senator Gary Hart's presidential campaign is derailed when he's caught in a scandalous love affair.

name: The Court Jester
summary_text: A hapless carnival performer masquerades as the court jester as part of a plot against an evil ruler who has overthrown the rightful King.

name: Robin and Marian
summary_text: Robin Hood, aging none too gracefully, returns exhausted from the Crusades to woo and win Maid Marian one last time.

name: Topsy-Turvy
summary_text: Set in the 1880s, the story of how, during a creative dry spell, the partnership of the legendary musical/theatrical writers Gilbert and Sullivan almost dissolves, before they turn it all around and write the Mikado.

name: Gung Ho
summary_text: When a Japanese car company buys an American plant, the American liaison must mediate the clash of work attitudes between the foreign management and native labor.

name: The Red Baron
summary_text: German biopic loosely based on the World War I fighter ace Manfred Von Richthofen, nicknamed the Red Baron by friend and foe alike.

name: The Longest Week
summary_text: Conrad (Jason Bateman) is helped by his old friend Dylan (Billy Crudup) and returns the favor by falling for Dylan's girlfriend Beatrice (Olivia Wilde).

name: The Disappearance of Eleanor Rigby: Them
summary_text: One couple's story as they try to reclaim the life and love they once knew and pick up the pieces of a past that may be too far gone.

name: Shoot to Kill
summary_text: An F.B.I. Agent teams up with a tracker to pursue a murderer after he vanishes into the mountains and infiltrates a hiking group.

name: Blind Dating
summary_text: A blind young man (Pine) thinks he finds love with an Indian woman (Jay), though their relationship is fraught with cultural differences.

name: Brothers
summary_text: After living many years together, two brothers discover that they are not blood related so square off in a mixed martial arts tournament to determine whose blood is stronger.

name: Paris
summary_text: A ex-dancer has a heart problem and even with a transplant, he may still only have a few months to live. Time's spent looking at people/life in Paris from his balcony. His single mom sister moves in with her 3 kids to look after him.

name: Paddleton
summary_text: An unlikely friendship between two misfit neighbors becomes an unexpectedly emotional journey when the younger man is diagnosed with terminal cancer.

name: 6 Years
summary_text: A young couple, bound by a seemingly ideal love, begin to unravel as unexpected opportunities spin them down a volatile and violent path and threaten the future they had always imagined.

name: Polaroid
summary_text: High school loner Bird Fitcher has no idea what dark secrets are tied to the Polaroid camera she finds. It doesn't take long to discover that those who have their picture taken with it, soon die.

name: What Doesn't Kill You
summary_text: Two childhood friends from South Boston turn to crime as a way to get by, ultimately causing a strain in their personal lives and their friendship.

name: Xin Su shi jian
summary_text: A simple Chinese immigrant wages a perilous war against one of the most powerful criminal organizations on the planet.

name: Nicholas Nickleby
summary_text: A young, compassionate man struggles to save his family and friends from the abusive exploitation of his cold-heartedly grasping uncle.

name: Dance Flick
summary_text: Street dancer Thomas Uncles is from the wrong side of the tracks, but his bond with the beautiful Megan White might help the duo realize their dreams as they enter in the mother of all dance battles.

name: You Get Me
summary_text: A one night stand turns into a nightmare for a High School student, when the obsession of a young woman grows dangerous.

name: The Hollars
summary_text: A man returns to his small hometown after learning that his mother has fallen ill and is about to undergo surgery.

name: The Possession of Michael King
summary_text: After poor advice from a psychic leads to the death of his wife, a man vows to disprove the existence of the paranormal by allowing himself to be possessed by demons.

name: Inventing the Abbotts
summary_text: Two working class brothers court three wealthy and beautiful sisters in a small Illinois town.

name: Meeting Evil
summary_text: John is taken on a murder-fueled ride by a mysterious stranger that transforms the weak-willed, disillusioned husband and father into a desperate hero willing to go to any length to protect his family.

name: The Romantics
summary_text: Seven close friends reunite for the wedding of two of their friends. Problems arise because the bride and the maid of honor have had a long rivalry over the groom.

name: Fashion
summary_text: A small-town girl finally realizes her dream of becoming a famous supermodel but soon finds out that there's a price for her glamorous new life.

name: The Meddler
summary_text: An aging widow from New York City follows her daughter to Los Angeles in hopes of starting a new life after her husband passes away.

name: The Night Porter
summary_text: A concentration camp survivor rekindles her sadomasochistic relationship with her lover, a former SS officer - now working as a night porter at a Vienna hotel - but his former Nazi associates begin stalking them.

name: Bad Girls
summary_text: Four prostitutes join together to travel the Old West.

name: Anatomy
summary_text: A cute med student starts a summer course at Heidelberg University. David's on her dissection table. She met him the day before on the train. Something's wrong.

name: Air
summary_text: In the near future, breathable air is nonexistent and two engineers tasked with guarding the last hope for mankind struggle to preserve their own lives while administering to their vital task at hand.

name: The Wild Geese
summary_text: A British banker hires a group of British mercenaries to rescue a deposed African President from the hands of a corrupt African dictator.

name: Jade
summary_text: A bright assistant D.A. investigates a gruesome hatchet murder and hides a clue he found at the crime scene. Under professional threats and an attempt on his life, he goes on heartbroken because evidence point to the woman he still loves.

name: Chupke Chupke
summary_text: A newly wedded husband plays a practical joke on his wife's family with full support from his wife and friends.

name: Cannibal! The Musical
summary_text: The sole survivor of an ill-fated mining expedition tells how his taste for gold was replaced by that of human flesh.

name: Mardaani
summary_text: A story of Shivani Shivaji Roy, Crime Branch, who sets out to confront the mastermind behind a child trafficking mafia.

name: Ask Me Anything
summary_text: A confused teenager writes a blog revealing her daily activities and secrets, advised to do so by her high school guidance counselor in lieu of moving onto her first year in college.

name: Calvaire
summary_text: Marc, a traveling entertainer, is on his way home for Christmas when his van breaks down in the middle of a jerkwater town with some strange inhabitants.

name: The Big Easy
summary_text: A corrupt lieutenant in the homicide division is threatened by the righteous DA while trying to solve a string of mysterious murders.

name: Flu
summary_text: Chaos ensues when a lethal, airborne virus infects the population of a South Korean city less than 20 kilometers from Seoul.

name: Divorce Italian Style
summary_text: A married Sicilian baron falls in love with his cousin and vows to wed her, but with divorce illegal he must concoct a crime of passion to do away with his wife.

name: Alice
summary_text: A surrealistic revision of Alice in Wonderland.

name: Cure
summary_text: A frustrated detective deals with the case of several gruesome murders committed by people who have no recollection of what they've done.

name: The Young Offenders
summary_text: Two teenage boys cycle 160km on stolen bikes pursued by police to find a missing bale of cocaine worth 7 million euro. Set around the real event of Ireland's biggest cocaine seizure in 2007 of 440 million euro.

name: Can You Keep a Secret?
summary_text: Thinking they're about to crash, Emma spills her secrets to a stranger on a plane. At least, she thought he was a stranger...Until she later meets Jack, her company's young CEO, who now knows every humiliating detail about her. Based on the blockbuster NYT bestseller.

name: Journey to the West
summary_text: Tang Sanzang, an aspiring Buddhist hero tries to protect a village from three demons. He develops complex feelings for Miss Duan, the demon hunter who repeatedly helps him, and finally quests to meet the legendary Monkey King.

name: Torrente, el brazo tonto de la ley
summary_text: José Luis Torrente, a former policeman fights against the oriental mafia in Madrid.

name: Moscow Does Not Believe in Tears
summary_text: This is a life story of three girlfriends from youth to autumn ages. Their dreams and wishes, love, disillusions. Different careers. And big late love.

name: Dutch
summary_text: To get to know his girlfriend's son, a working-class good guy volunteers to pick him up from his prep school, only to learn that he isn't the nicest young man.

name: Backtrack
summary_text: A psychotherapist has nightmares and sinister visions. Ghosts? Is it more than his daughter's death causing this? He returns to his childhood home and dad to put things to rest.

name: Little Monsters
summary_text: A boy discovers an incredible and gruesome world of monsters under his bed.
